===International community===
===International community===
â
[[Pope Benedict XVI]] of the [[Roman Catholic Church]] denounced the attacks in his New Year address.<ref name="ysaleh"/> He also appealed for religious freedom and religious tolerance in the [[Middle East]], and urged world leaders to defend [[Christians]] against discrimination, abuse and religious intolerance which are today striking Christians in particular.<ref name="VancouverSun">{{cite news|title=Pope leads condemnation of Egypt church attack|url=http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Pope+leads+condemnation+Egypt+church+attack/4048033/story.html|accessdate=2 January 2011|newspaper=Vancouver Sun|date=1 January 2011}}</ref>
+
*{{flagicon|Vatican City}} [[Pope Benedict XVI]] of the [[Roman Catholic Church]] denounced the attacks in his New Year address.<ref name="ysaleh"/> He also appealed for religious freedom and religious tolerance in the [[Middle East]], and urged world leaders to defend [[Christians]] against discrimination, abuse and religious intolerance which are today striking Christians in particular.<ref name="VancouverSun">{{cite news|title=Pope leads condemnation of Egypt church attack|url=http://www.vancouversun.com/news/Pope+leads+condemnation+Egypt+church+attack/4048033/story.html|accessdate=2 January 2011|newspaper=Vancouver Sun|date=1 January 2011}}</ref>
[[Archbishop of Canterbury]] Dr. [[Rowan Williams]] condemned the bombing, declaring that "The New Year's Eve attack on Christians in Alexandria is yet another dreadful reminder of the pressure Christian minorities are under in the [[Middle East]], echoing the atrocities we have seen in recent weeks", in reference to the [[2010 Baghdad church attack|attack on the church of Our Lady of Salvation]] in [[Iraq]], carried out by the [[Islamic State of Iraq]].<ref name="Telegraph">{{cite news|title=Car bomb in Egypt kills at least 17 outside Christian church|url=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/africaandindianocean/egypt/8235037/Car-bomb-in-Egypt-kills-at-least-17-outside-Christian-church.html|accessdate=2 January 2011|newspaper=The Telegraph|date=2 January 2011}}</ref>
[[Archbishop of Canterbury]] Dr. [[Rowan Williams]] condemned the bombing, declaring that "The New Year's Eve attack on Christians in Alexandria is yet another dreadful reminder of the pressure Christian minorities are under in the [[Middle East]], echoing the atrocities we have seen in recent weeks", in reference to the [[2010 Baghdad church attack|attack on the church of Our Lady of Salvation]] in [[Iraq]], carried out by the [[Islamic State of Iraq]].<ref name="Telegraph">{{cite news|title=Car bomb in Egypt kills at least 17 outside Christian church|url=http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/worldnews/africaandindianocean/egypt/8235037/Car-bomb-in-Egypt-kills-at-least-17-outside-Christian-church.html|accessdate=2 January 2011|newspaper=The Telegraph|date=2 January 2011}}</ref>
